long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Most GNUCash reports reload repeatedly after opening, creating the appearance that they are flickering on the screen.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
Every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open gnucash 2. Select a report
Actual results:
Report loads and reloads repeatedly.
Expected results:
Report should load once.
Additional info:
The flickering stops eventually. Sometimes it stops on its own after 5-15 seconds; sometimes it stops when I switch to a different report and then back to the first one.

This bug is being discussed on the gnucash-users mailing list:
https://lists.gnucash.org/pipermail/gnucash-user/2017-January/068525.html
No bug has been filed yet on the Gnome bugzilla.

An upstream bug report has been filed:
https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=777875
This should be resolved for gnucash 2.6.16, release two weeks ago.
